pages.text: There are times where you've grown tired of running out of coal or wished to used them for other purposes, you've discovered a way to smelt ores and other items using Soul Energy.

The Soul Kiln is a Cursed Infuser that burns and smelts items instead of infusing them with magic. The Soul Kiln needs to be on top of a $(l:intro/cursed_cage)Cursed Cage$() that has a $(l:intro/magical_emeralds)Totem$() in it to work.
Unlike the Infuser, multiple items can be inserted into Soul Kiln, either by hand or through Hoppers.
